statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount, timestamp FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'approved' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT amount, user_id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT amount, user_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT reason, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason ILIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT admin_id, username FROM administrators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions JOIN transactions ON suspicious_transactions.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id WHERE suspicious_transactions.reason = 'Fraud' ORDER BY suspicious_transactions.timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM administrators WHERE email LIKE '%example.com'
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ST UNION SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE ST.transaction_id = transaction_id AND amount < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id, timestamp FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT notification_id, admin_id, message FROM admin_notifications WHERE admin_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 12345;
SELECT admin_id, message FROM admin_notifications ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, suspicious_transactions.reason FROM transactions LEFT JOIN suspicious_transactions ON transactions.transaction_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id WHERE suspicious_transactions.reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE status='pending';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='johndoe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id=10;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 AND u.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT t.user_id, a.alert_message FROM transactions t JOIN alerts a ON t.user_id = a.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM admins UNION SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
